description: The NE 2nd Avenue Partnership (NE2P) is a community initiated and collaborative effort composed of diverse stakeholders interested in a comprehensive revitalization of the key commercial corridors of NE 2nd Avenue and 54th Street in the GÇ£Downtown Little HaitiGÇ¥ of Miami, FL. NE2P is committed to creating and sustaining a vibrant commercial center in Little Haiti which increases economic opportunities and forges an indelible cultural identity for the area.
name: NORTHEAST SECOND AVENUE PARTNERSHIP, INC.
